trustfund: TF020090-BELGIAN CONSULTANTS TRUST FUND,TF027965-ECONOMIC MANAGEMENT PROJECT IN BENIN

abstracts.cdata!:
The project is designed to improve
            economic management capabilities in Benin.  In particular
            the project aims at:  (i) strengthening the preparation and
            management of the Public Investment Program (PIP), the
            Budget, and improving the quality of the National Accounts;
            (ii) strengthening staff capabilities in economic and
            financial management, and establishing a permanent
            government capability to train its own staff; and (iii)
            supporting the government's overall economic reform
            program.  To achieve these objectives, the project will:
            (i) provide support for the development of a training
            program to be carried out in a national training center; and
            (ii) provide support to the preparation and execution of the
            PIP and the budget through technical assistance to the
            Ministry of Planning, the Ministry of Finance and the
            sectoral ministries.  The project will also finance studies
            and consultant services to support the implementation of the
            government's economic reform program.
